Screenwriter: Alexandre Bustillo, Julien Maury, Alexandre Bustillo, Julien Maury
Production Co: Backup Films, Canal+, Cofimage 22, Plug Effects, La Ferme! Productions, La Fabrique 2, SND Films, CinéCinéma, Coficup
Synopsis: Lucie (Chloé Coulloud), Ben (Jérémy Kapone) and William (Félix Moati) search an old woman's home for a hidden treasure and they encounter a series of supernatural events that change them forever.
Title: Livid
